prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If candidates are provided, you MUST choose one of them (even if it slightly overshoots quantity) and justify the pick—never return null when at least one candidate exists.
        Only when no candidates are supplied may you set `selected_product_id` to null, and those notes must begin with `MISSING_SKU:` so the pipeline can flag the meal for removal.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_FamSEAsia15to30",
  "name": "Family Thai & Vietnamese Quick Bowls",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Thai",
      "Vietnamese"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild",
      "Medium"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "SemiPrepared"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Family Pho-Style Beef Rice Noodle Soup",
  "description": "Speedy Vietnamese-style beef noodle soup with a fragrant broth and kid-adjustable toppings. Pour the hot broth over thin-sliced steak so it cooks in the bowl.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Thinly slice beef sirloin steak across the grain.",
    "Peel and thinly slice onion.",
    "Rinse and pick basil, mint, and coriander leaves; slice spring onion.",
    "Cut lime into wedges.",
    "Set out sriracha for optional heat."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Add beef stock to a large pot and bring to a boil over high heat.",
    "Add onion, cinnamon, star anise, cloves, fish sauce, and sugar. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes for fragrance.",
    "Add rice noodles to the pot and cook until just tender (3–4 minutes).",
    "Use tongs to divide noodles into 4 bowls. Strain or ladle the hot broth over the noodles, leaving whole spices in the pot.",
    "Top each bowl with raw thin-sliced beef; immediately ladle extra boiling broth over the beef so it cooks through.",
    "Garnish with basil, mint, coriander, and spring onion. Serve with lime wedges and sriracha on the side."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "beef sirloin steak",
      "quantity": "400 g",
      "preparation": "thinly sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "beef stock",
      "quantity": "1.5 liters",
      "preparation": "bring to boil"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "rice noodles",
      "quantity": "400 g",
      "preparation": "cook in broth"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onion",
      "quantity": "1 large",
      "preparation": "thinly sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cinnamon",
      "quantity": "1 stick or 1 tsp ground",
      "preparation": "add to broth"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "star anise",
      "quantity": "2 whole",
      "preparation": "add to broth"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cloves",
      "quantity": "4 whole",
      "preparation": "add to broth"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "fish sauce",
      "quantity": "2–3 tbsp",
      "preparation": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sugar",
      "quantity": "1 tsp",
      "preparation": "to balance"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "basil",
      "quantity": "1 cup leaves",
      "preparation": "for garnish"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "mint",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup leaves",
      "preparation": "for garnish"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "coriander",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup leaves",
      "preparation": "for garnish"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spring onion",
      "quantity": "3",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lime",
      "quantity": "2",
      "preparation": "cut into wedges"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sriracha",
      "quantity": "to taste",
      "preparation": "optional, at table"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Thai",
      "Vietnamese"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Seafood"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighProtein"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "Microwave",
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
